message.content:
The task is to identify and extract the value of cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period.

From the "cash flow" section of the financial statement, under "Cash and Cash Equivalents," the "Beginning Balance" is listed.

Reviewing the table:

| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cash and Cash Equivalents |  | 2024-01-29 |
| Beginning Balance  | 8000000.00 | 2024-01-29 |
| Ending Balance  | 7406964.73 | 2024-01-29 |
| Net Increase  | -593035.27 | 2024-01-29 |

The value at the beginning of the period is 8,000,000.00.

Thus the answer is:

```json
{"solution": {"value": "8000000.00"}}
````
